channel.title: 1 bug please someone?
channel.description: Hello. I got 1 bug and that is the 0 hp bug... If u stay on 1 place or stay like 3 mins on server and u get attacked then ur hp will be 0 and u have to re-log. Or you just cant attack someone or someone you. I got a 525 server dragonscape. Can someone pleeaasseee help me?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 23, 2009, 03:12:35 am[/size][hr]Edit:I fixed the hp bar bug but still u get 0 hp and u dont die.

item.title: 1 bug please someone?

.> we are erm… lets say not really good friends you know…

Its really anoying every 3 min log out pff…
I think even my fans that are crazy because i have a server will quit…
